synopsis.text:
Resigning himself to a life of monotony, high school student Michio Kaga finds solace in the depths of the internet. One day, he stumbles upon an enigmatic website that draws him in with its peculiar questions and point-based system. Curiosity piqued, Michio designs a character with extraordinary abilities, only to be whisked away to a fantastical realm as the very character he created.

Trapped in this new world with no means of escape, Michio discovers that he possesses unparalleled strength and cheat powers. With his newfound abilities, he embarks on a thrilling adventure, battling bandits, and exploring dangerous dungeons. Along the way, he encounters stunningly beautiful women, each possessing idol-like charm. Seizing the opportunity, Michio sets his sights on forming his own harem, filled with enchanting maidens to accompany him on his journey.

In this captivating tale of power, adventure, and desire, follow Michio as he embraces his new life, conquers challenges, and indulges in the ultimate fantasy â€“ building a harem of exquisite beauty in a world where the possibilities are endless.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
